Text:
There are two parts of Scion Companion missing.  These are "The Devas" and "The World at War".  I'm *very* interested in "The Devas", so if someone could post that, I'd be very grateful.

Also missing are "Yazata: The Persian Gods", which sounds interesting, and "Liberty Road", which is an adventure, so nice to have, but not necessary.
Taelgno would you be able to help several people including myself, finish Freakazoid?
